name: Precious Cargo
description: A valuable and rare mineral has been discovered on a distant planet, and your mission is to transport it to an HQ.

name: Ancient Artifacts
description: You must transport a collection of ancient artifacts from a planet to a museum. The artifacts are priceless and must be protected from pirates and other dangers.

name: Energy Crisis
description: A planet is experiencing an energy crisis, and its inhabitants are in danger. You must transport a large supply of petrol to the planet to prevent a catastrophe.

name: Construction Site
description: A colony on a distant planet needs iron to expand its infrastructure. You must transport the iron safely to the colony to aid in its development.

name: Gemstone Heist
description: A wealthy customer has bought some jewellery. You must transport the jewellery safely and protect it from thieves.

name: Crystal Cavern
description: A planet has a network of crystal caverns that contain rare and valuable crystals. You must transport the crystals to a processing facility.

name: Gemstone Cache
description: Une planète possède une série de géodes qui contiennent des pierres précieuses. Vous devez transporter les pierres précieuses vers un centre de traitement sans les endommager.

name: Salt Mine
description: A planet has a rich deposit of salt that is needed for a colony's food supply. You must excavate and transport the salt to the colony.

name: Coal Extraction
description: A planet has a large supply of coal that is needed for an industrial facility. You must excavate and transport the coal to the facility.

name: Refueling Run
description: A remote planet has a large deposit of petrol that is needed to power a research facility. You must transport the petrol to the facility.

name: Ancient Discovery
description: A team of archaeologists has discovered an ancient artifact on a distant planet. You must transport the artifact back to a research facility for analysis.

name: Stolen Treasure
description: A valuable artifact has been stolen from a museum, and you must transport it back to the museum without being caught by the thieves.

name: Resource Redistribution
description: A colony on a planet is experiencing an imbalance of crystal, and the crystal need to be relocated to different areas. You must transport the resources.

name: Metal Expedition
description: A planet has a deposit of a rare metal that is needed for a new spacecraft. You must transport the metal to a spacecraft manufacturing facility.
